data.description:
Sleuth, Explorer, Archaeologist, Private Eye, Soldier of Fortune

 

Special Abilities

Swings & Leaps: Roll with Advantage on Saves when performing athletic tasks, like: climbing, jumping, leaping, swinging, flipping.

Choose two from the following:

  • Scrounger: You can offset the loss of an item of equipment’s Resource Die by losing an Investigation Die instead.
  • Slippery Customer: Once per session your slippery nature allows you to shift the repercussions of a failed INT or WIS Save to someone else.
  • Steady Hand: Once per game hour, you automatically succeed with a single Ranged Armed Attack.
